name: Wisp (PixelPhobicGames)
description:
A Platformer Written in C++ With 30 Levels Made With Only Ascii Characters.

Controls:

Jump: Up Arrow Key

Right: Right Arrow Key

Left: Left Arrow Key

Shoot ( Normal Weapon ): Space

Shoot ( Boss Stage Weapon ): Left Click

Fullscreen: F11

Low Spec Mode: L

Make Sure to Have Some Sort of Audio Device Plugged in Or the Game will not launch.
